## W0107-245310 External Temperature-Controlled Storage RFP

### Request for Proposal
** Title | Publication Date | Closing Date | Amendment Date | Expected Contract Start Date | Expected Contract End Date | Contract Status **
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
W0107-245310 External Temperature-Controlled Storage | 2023-07-04 | 2023-07-19T14:00:00 | 2023-07-11 | 2023-08-01 | 2025-07-31 | **Expired**

### Request Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for External Temperature-Controlled Storage services. This procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP), competitive and open to all qualified suppliers.

### Service Requirements
The contractor is required to provide an external temperature-controlled container (reefer, container, trailer) to store temperature-sensitive products (MCMs, vaccines, and pharmaceuticals) for CMED at Garrison Petawawa.

### Description of Service
The service description is as follows:

 Rent an external temperature-controlled container to store temperature-sensitive products during current maintenance and repair of CMED equipment. The service is required for a period of 2 years.

### Notice Details

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Limited Tendering Reason: None
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Region of Opportunity: None

### Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Wayne Cook, PSPC/SPAC
*   Contact Email: wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Contact Phone: Not Available
*   Contact Fax: Not Available
